name: Kim Possible 3: Team Possible
summary: Kim Possible has teamed with Ron Stoppable to battle evil villains such as Monkey/Gorilla Fist, Senor Senior, Jr., Shego and the evil Dr. Drakken and save the world! Players will switch between Kim and Ron to master their unique gadgets, such as the Grappling Hook, Sonic Mines, Rocket Rollerblades and more. Single and multi-player action will make for varied game play. Collectible trading cards and un-lockable mini-games featuring Rufus, the naked mole rat, keep the fun going.
info:
• 中文名: 麻辣女孩3：团队任务
  • 平台: GBA

  • 开发: Artificial Mind and Movement
